About Me

I was born and raised in Moldova, lived in USA, Russia, Asia and for a few last years I live in Oslo, Norway. I have visited just a few places around the world, and I have always admired the beauty of nature and the everchanging chaos of urban life. I love to capture the magnifisent nature, and the unique, living and breathing personality of cities and people living in them.


I do photography for fun and a as something that I call "a professional hobby". I will always do it for myself, and will always share it with someone, who might share and enjoy the moments that I capture.


If you would like to be a part of my journey, send me an e-mail by clicking the button below.

When it comes to the beloved topic of GEAR, then I should tell you, and you might have heard it somewhere before, it's not about the gear. Mostly. Would you guess which photos in my portfolio are made with just my phone?
